title: SonicWall Firewall - Network
description: This dashboard provides information about the Firewall Network logs generated in SonicWall Firewall.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides insights on network logs.
- Network logs displays network traffic details, threat detection, and system events related to network security.
- The DHCP group tracks DHCP logs, including lease IP information and the total discovered, acknowledged and non-acknowledged packets.
- L2TP tracks logs related to VPN connection attempts, successes, and failures. This group allows for detailed tracking of remote access activity.
- The DNS group provides detailed monitoring of DNS traffic, helping to identify potential issues or malicious activity within the network.

definition.title: Network Events by Priority Over Time

search.query: source:sonicwall-firewall @gcat:6 @message_id:(205 OR 207 OR 211 OR 212 OR 215 OR 217) $Username $Priority

query.query_string: source:sonicwall-firewall @gcat:6 @message_id:(201 OR 202 (([204 TO 208] OR [210 TO 212] OR 215 OR 217))) $Priority $Username
